message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.IR 

This paper deals with the detection of fraudulent activities on the Bitcoin blockchain, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The use of data mining techniques and machine learning algorithms to detect patterns in the transactions suggests that this paper could also be classified under data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and social and information networks (cs.SI). The use of Bitcoin as a platform for Ponzi schemes could also make this paper relevant to the sub-categories of cybercrime (cs.CY) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
